summary: "Revolutionary Road" is a 2008 drama film directed by Sam Mendes, starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet as a 1950s couple facing marriage issues. Based on Richard Yates' novel, the film took decades to adapt due to script disagreements. Winslet and Mendes, who were married at the time, revived the project, with Winslet persuading DiCaprio to join. The film received positive reviews and multiple award nominations, including three at the Academy Awards. It earned over $79 million worldwide.
title: Revolutionary Road (film)
